message: Let's split it evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a little more, but I'm not going to let you take it all!  Let's get this done.
You're losing value every round, I'm being generous here.
This is my final offer.  I'm not letting inflation completely destroy my share, but I'm also willing to be fair. Take it or leave it.
